channel.title: Mediator Design Pattern on Software Developer

item.title: Mediator Design Pattern
item.description: This is an assignment question I had for my Design Patterns and Software Testing class. It is an important question to answer because it deals with a real life situation. The question is also very detailed and will help me understand this certain design pattern. Problem: In this question, you are requested to design a representation for the “Department” in this company. There are currently four departments in this company as follow:
